engDesc: A bank of English words. The largest bank, the bank has words that range from A to Z.
espDesc: A bank of Spanish words. A smaller bank, the bank has words that range from A to Z.
danDesc: A bank of Danish words. A smaller bank, the bank has words that range from A to Z.
desc: The game will display a word. Type it into the text box to score points. The longer the word, the more points you get! You only have 60 seconds to score as many points as possible.
